spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The red wizard evoker is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The red wizard evoker has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: School Specialization
entries: Red wizard evokers speciallize in the evocation magic school, sacrificing their ability to cast illusion and enchantment spells in the process. In exchange they gain the following benefits:
Each time the red wizard casts a 1st level or higher evocation spell it gains the benefit of being casted one level higher.
Evocation cantrips add the red wizard's Intelligence modifier to its damage.
Creatures have disadvantage resisting the red wizard's evocation spells.

headerEntries: Rezmir's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Whenever Rezmir casts a spell on a creature she is hidden from the target has disadvantage on the saving throw. She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Tainted by the Devil
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede Rezmir's darkvision, also the shadows cover her constantly giving the benefits from the {@spell mage armor} spell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Rezmir has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Rezmir has an {@item Insignia of Claws|HotDQ}, the {@item Black Dragon Mask|HotDQ} and {@item Hazirawn|HotDQ}. This weapon is magically linked to the half-dragon, so she uses her Charisma to calculate bot hit and damage with that weapon. Rezmir can, as a bonus action, summon the sword to her hand as long as they are in the same plane.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Rezmir can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Immolation
entries: When Rezmir is reduced to 0 hit points, her body disintegrates into a pile of ash.

trait.name: Split Soul
entries: A part of Rezmir's soul can manifest as a separated entity, thought which she can see and talk as if it was her {@creature rezmir's shadow|customtiamat|avatar}. That shadow acts on its own initiative and can't really die until Rezmir is destroyed, but it is 'undone' if takes enough damage.

Rezmir can use her bonus action in order to teleport the shadow or restore it in an available space 5 feet from her, the shadow can exist 100 feet from Rezmir, but in order to move further it needs to control the body of a willing {@creature black abishai|mtf|abishai}.
While this creature is active Rezmir's body casts no shadow.

trait.name: Dark Advantage
entries: Once per turn, Rezmir can deal an extra 18 ({@dice 5d6}) damage when she hits with a weapon attack, provided Rezmir has advantage on the attack roll or a non-{@condition incapacitated} creature allied with her is 5-feet from the target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rezmir can either make two weapon attacks or cast a spell and make a weapon attack (in any order). She can also replace any weapon attack with a Caustic Bolt attack.

action.name: Greatsword (Hazirawn)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. The target can make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending this effect early on a success.

action.name: Caustic Bolt
entries: {@atk rsp} {@hit 9}  to hit, range 90 ft, one target. Hit 22 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}

reaction.name: I reject my humanity!
entries: Rezmir can take this reaction even if she has no reactions left this turn. Whenever Rezmir recieves an attack that leaves her with half her hit points or less she can equip the {@item Black Dragon Mask|HotDQ} as long as it is within her items. The mask is instantly attuned to Rezmir.

entries: Rezmir makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Hide
entries: Rezmir takes the {@action Hide} action, she can then move up to 10 feet.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Rezmir casts one of her at-will spells.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Langdedrosa is a 12th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma(spell save {@dc 16}, +8 to hit with spell attacks). Langdedrosa knows the following spells:
footerEntries: Langdedrosa can use the amulet he carries on his left hand as a spellcasting focus for the spells that require material components. He also can perform somatic components even when he has weapons or a shield in one or both hands, and has advantage on Constitution saving throws that he makes to maintain his concentration on a spells.

trait.name: Improved critical
entries: Langdedrosa's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On this turn, Langdedrosa can take one additional action.

trait.name: Living tempest
entries: Any lightning damage Langdedrosa deals ignores damage resistance and treats immunities as resistances.

trait.name: Aura of protection
entries: Langdedrosa and any creature he chooses within 10 feet of him gains a bonus to any saving throw equal to his Charisma modifier.

trait.name: Improved divine smite
entries: Whenever Langdedrosa hits a creature with a melee weapon, the creature takes an extra {@dice 1d8} lightning damage (already included). When he hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, he can expend one spell slot to deal lightning damage to the target, in addition to the weapon's damage. The extra damage is {@dice 2d8} for a 1st-level spell slot, plus {@dice 1d8} for each spell level higher than 1st, to a maximum of {@dice 5d8}. The damage increases by {@dice 1d8} if the target is an undead or a fiend, to a maximum of {@dice 6d8}.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Langdedrosa's carries a {@item Greatsword|PHB}+2, a {@item Splint Armor|PHB}+1 and a {@item Ring of Protection|DMG}, whose modifiers have already been included on his stats.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Langdedrosa makes two attacks, either with his greatsword or spears.

action.name: Greatsword+2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage. If any damage die rolls 1 or 2 Langdedrosa can reroll it once.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage in melee, or 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage at range.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Langdedrosa exhales lightning in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@dice 10d10})  lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Lay on Hands
entries: Langdedrosa has a pool of 60 hit points that replenishes when he takes a long rest. He can touch a creature and draw power from the pool to restore a number of hit points to that creature, up to the maximum amount remaining in your pool. He also can cure multiple diseases and neutralize multiple poisons with a single use of Lay on Hands for 5 hit points each. Has no effect on undead or constructs.
Alternatively once per short or long rest he can spend his bonus action to retrieve 8 ({@dice 1d10 + 3}) hit points.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Langdedrosa adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack from an attacker he can see, then, if the attack misses, he can make a weapon attack against the target with advantage. Langdedrosa can only use this reaction if he is wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Weapon attack
entries: Langdedrosa makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Langdedrosa makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Static Cast
entries: This action can only be used once per turn. Langdedrosa covers himself with an aura of electricity thats either provides him with 15 temporary hit points or ends a negative condition on himself, he can after that either cast an action spell or make a ranged spell attack of 11 ({@damage 2d10}) lightning damage.

legendary.name: Thunder Dash (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: A veil of electricity covers Langdedrosa, who flashes for a moment and moves in a straight line as if he was a lightning bolt, reappearing on an unoccupied possition no further from 30 feet. Each creature on a possition Langdedrosa went through on his movement must take a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Rezmir takes a boss action to cause one of these effects, in the following order:

entries: Rezmir casts {@spell wall of force} using no components and tries to divide the field separating her enemies. Rezmir doesn't need to keep concentration on the spell, but killing her avatar will inmediately destroy it.

entries.name: Action 3
entries: Rezmir casts {@spell greater invisibility} on herself. The spell lasts until iniciative count 20 of the next round.

entries.name: Action 4: Punish

A target takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

entries.name: Action 5: Repeat

entries: Severin adds his Charisma bonus to his AC (included).

trait.name: Arms of the Astral Self

The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell, and they take no damage if they would normally take half damage on a successful save.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The troglodyte grunt has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte grunt must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troglodyte makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Poison Shot {@recharge 5}
entries: The troglodyte grunt can spit a sticky poisonous mixture of saliva and mucus, when it does the objective is always the target's head, in order to cause blindness. This works as a regular attack with {@hit 5} to hit and 6 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, but the target also has to succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw of be {@condition blinded}. In order to get rid of this condition the target must use an action to remove the substance or succeed on the saving throw at the end of his turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The shadow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the shadow's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The shadow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The shadow's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Dark Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the shadow can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack, provided it has advantage on the attack roll. Any {@creature black abishai|mtf|abishai} within 60-feet of the shadow gains a +2 bonus to hit with all its attacks and adds {@dice 1d6} damage to its weapon attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadow can either make two weapon attacks or cast a spell and make a weapon attack (in any order).

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Warp
entries: Whenever en enemy enters the shadow's reach it can immediately cast the {@spell misty step} spell using no components as part of this reaction.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Dralmorrer is a 11th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Dralmorrer has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

trait.name: Weapon Bond
entries: Provided his longsword is on the same plane Dralmorrer can take a bonus action to teleport it to his hand.

trait.name: War Magic
entries: When Dralmorrer uses his action to cast a cantrip or a spell, he can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Dralmorrer has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On this turn, Dralmorrer can take one additional action.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Dralmorrer can, as a bonus action, recover 16 ({@dice 1d10 + 11}) hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Dralmorrer makes three attacks with any of his weapons.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

legendary.name: Cast a Cantrip
entries: Dralmorrer casts one of his cantrips.

legendary.name: Recover (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Dralmorrer can use this action even if he can't take actions. Dralmorrer ends a negative condition on himself.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Pharblex is a 11th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Pharblex has the following spells prepared from the druid spell list:

trait.name: Ninble Escape
entries: Pharblex can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Pharblex can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: Pharblex has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Poison Strike (3/Day)
entries: Once per turn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

trait.name: Halo of Spores
entries: Pharblex is surrounded by {@condition invisible}, necrotic spores that are harmless until he unleashes them on a creature nearby. When a creature he can see moves into a space within 10 feet of him or starts its turn there, Pharblex can use his reaction to deal {@dice 1d8} necrotic damage to that creature unless it succeeds on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Pharblex attacks twice. Once with his bite and once with his spear.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 8 ({@damage 2d8}) posion damage. The target must then succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute, the target can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of his turns .

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) posion damage.

action.name: Symbiotic Entity (recharges after a short or long rest)
entries: Pharblex awakens his magical spores, gaining 44 temporary hit points for 10 minutes. While he has at least one of those points he rolls the Halo of spones' damage die twice and adds it to the total, his melee attacks also deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

legendary.name: Poison Spit
entries: Pharblex casts his {@spell poison spray} cantrip.

legendary.name: Goo Slip
entries: Pharblex uses the goo on his feet to slide across the battlefield, he can move up to his walking speed in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the half-dragon hits with it (already included).

trait.name: Brave
entries: The half-dragon has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Team Worker
entries: The half-dragon can take the {@action help} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Frost Weapons
entries: When the half-dragon hits a creature with a melee weapon attack it can add 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage to the damage roll (already included).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-dragon makes three melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 39 ({@damage 9d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The half-dragon adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the half-dragon must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Substitute
entries: When a willing creature within 5 feet of the half-dragon is targeted by an attack, the half-dragon can switch possitions with that creature and become the attack's target. None of those movements povoke opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If the psychic ooze takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn. This trait along with its vulnerability to fire damaged are canceled as long as it is wet.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The psychic ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psychic ooze makes three attacks with its pseudopods. It can replace one pseudopod attack with a use of Drain Intellect.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until the grapple ends the target is {@condition restrained}. The psychic ooze can grapple up to two medium creatures.

action.name: Drain Intellect
entries: A creature the psychic ooze is grappling must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw, or transfer 2 of its intelligence points to the ooze. reaction.name: Redirect
entries: When the psychic ooze is targeted by a spell that forces it to make a saving throw and then fails said saving throw, it can redirect the spell effect to another friendly ooze within 30 feet as long as there is water connecting them.

action.name: Entangle
entries: The psychic ooze zombie can rebuild its body in order to capture a medium or smaller creature. reaction.name: Riposte (needs Edward)
